short_description: A free Magento and Salesforce integration solution that offers an easy way to synchronize Magento 2 customers with Salesforce CRM.
long_description:
Today, over 100,000 of the world's most innovative companies - large, medium and small - use Salesforce CRM to close bigger deals faster. It is considered the world's #1 CRM platform in the world. Salesforce Sales Cloud CRM is used by both B2C and B2B merchants and is an effective tool for your business to collaborate, mobilize, and grow revenue.

With Salesforce Sales Cloud integration, you eliminate unnecessary data entry saving you and your business time and money. Our solution allows you to automatically synchronize millions of Magento customer records with the Salesforce Force.com platform and capture business-critical customer data without having to rely on a manual data entry.

Taking a step further, if customer data in Magento changes, our solution has the capability to automatically update customer records in Salesforce to make sure the data remains consistent in both systems.

We help businesses save thousands of hours annually and in many cases quarterly which translates to roughly one to three full-time resources per year.

 

Account & Pricing

If you don't have Salesforce Sales Cloud account, you will need to set one up prior to using this extension. Salesforce Sales Cloud does not supply public pricing information.

  

Benefits & Key Features

  • A simple setup which takes minutes
  • Automated customer & customer address synchronization
  • Built with data normalization (duplicate prevention mechanism)
  • Supports real-time synchronization and on-demand synchronization 
  • Integration quality guarantee and access to the support team through an online portal.
  • OpenSource code for you to customize and to fit any unique business processes

 

Looking for More Features? Try Our Paid Version.

Contact us to learn more about the paid version of the integration between Magento and Salesforce. The paid version includes the following features:

  • Magento Catalog synchronization
  • Integration with Salesforce PriceBooks
  • State and Country picklist values support in Salesforce
  • Ability to differentiate between customers and potential customers
  • Multi-website support
  • Support for B2B and B2C customer records
  • Historical data synchronization
  • Abandoned carts & potential sales
  • Flexible mappings allowing you to control what data is sent from Magento into Salesforce
  • Bi-directional synchronization
  • Scheduled and real-time synchronization flexibility
  • Additional tools geared towards multi-thousand record synchronization and fast manipulation
  • The smart logic to help with data normalization and data de-duplication
  • Ability to manage customer subscription status and integration with Salesforce Campaigns
  • Multi-currency support
  • Ability to capture invoices, shipments and tracking numbers in Salesforce
  • Ability to control the system of record for data at the field level

If that is not enough, tell us about your business model and process and we can help you bridge the gap between both platforms while supporting your custom flows and any custom solutions you may have in place.
